olm.calcite.calc_k1¶

olm.calcite.calc_k1(T_K)[source]¶

Calculates k1+ kinetic constant from Table 1 of Kaufmann and Dreybrodt (2007).

Parameters
T_Kfloat

temperature Kelvin

Returns
k1float

kinetic constant k1+

Notes

Related to the rate of CO2 conversion.
